title: CGA Keen 6?
content:
I'm no expert, but someone who apparently found a copy of Keen6 full version might have a CGA version...

Check [url=http://dosclassics.com/forum_post.php?id=176]dosclassics.com/forum_post.php?id=176[/url]!____________
I have a boring signature.

...
Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site[/url].

title: Re: CGA Keen 6?
content:
That's not the CGA version. I'm pretty sure the C in the name stands for "cracked" as the monster name check has been removed from that version.

Anyways, I thought some of the board visitors here have the CGA version of Keen 6, but why doesn't anyone make a patch? Also how did you originally purchase the CGA version? I thought only the EGA one appeared on the store shelves, right?

title: Re: CGA Keen 6?
content:
Well, thats for sure the cga version of k6... it was also the version selled with the id-anthologie (they burned the cga-version onto the cd by mistake although the directory contains the graphic files for both version)

MfG

title: Re: CGA Keen 6?
content: No it's not the CGA Commander Keen 6 version. He said himself that the game was in EGA, and besides I've once located this KEEN6C.EXE myself, and it is exactly the same as the original KEEN6.EXE 1.0, but the manual check has been removed!

title: Re: CGA Keen 6?
content: some1 should ask him, if there is a blue box which contains somethin like "Raw Copy PC TSR Patch" when he starts his copy of keen6. in this case it is a cracked version (however the starter is afaik a .com-file - but this could easily be renamed to .exe...)

title: Re: CGA Keen 6?
content:
Hey read the thread that the post links to! The one who found it says that it is the EGA, yes EGA version of the game, and there is another crack than the well known TSR that replaces the exe. It has some bytes modified so that instead of the new game section taking you into the document check, it takes you straight into the game.

So in conclusion this is the cracked version of Keen 6 EGA!

title: Re: CGA Keen 6?
content:
